thoughts.text: I would like to visit the website https://www.mkewithkids.com/post/10-educational-websites-that-will-actually-let-you-work-for-an-hour-or-two/ and learn from it. I think the 'browse_website' command would be appropriate for this task.

thoughts.plan:
- Use the 'browse_website' command to visit the website https://www.mkewithkids.com/post/10-educational-websites-that-will-actually-let-you-work-for-an-hour-or-two/
- Read the content on the website and take notes on the most interesting and useful information
- Save the notes for future reference

args.question: What are the 10 educational websites that will let you work for an hour or two?
